regular professional Newsletter and scholarly Journal. It will also maintain a
directory of educational radio stations.
NETRC will publish the Directory of Educational Television Stations
(formerly issued annually by JCET) and will maintain its present publications,
^ET News, Inside Channelss and ^ET Annual Reports together with such other
special reports or publications as may be necessary to interpret activities of
NETRC and affiliated stations to each other, to the field, and to the general
public.
NAEB and NETRC will attempt to coordinate their publications in
order to avoid duplication and to service adequately all those engaged in or
interested in educational radio and television.
JR 1-21-61
